card.name: Arrest
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can’t attack or block, and its activated abilities can’t be activated.

card.name: Bantha Herd
card.text: XWW: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Bantha Herd becomes monstrous, create X 1/1 white Tusken Raider tokens.

card.name: The Battle of Hoth
card.text: Create X 5/5 white artifact AT-AT creature tokens with “When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white Trooper creature tokens.”

card.name: Battle Tactics
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Cantina Band
card.text: {1}, {T}: Tap target nonartifact creature.

card.name: Condemn
card.text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner’s library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Deploy The Troops
card.text: Create three 1/1 white Trooper creature tokens.

card.name: Droideka
card.text: 2U: Change a target of target spell or ability to Droideka. Repair 3 (When this is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: EMP Blast
card.text: Exile target artifact. Tap all other artifacts.

card.name: Escape Pod
card.text: Exile target creature you control. Return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Force Healing
card.text: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. Scry 1.

card.name: Force Reflex
card.text: Untap target creature. It gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Gifted Initiate
card.text: When Gifted Initiate enters, you may tap target creature and Gifted Initiate. Meditate 1W (1W: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ion Cannon
card.text: Defender {T}: Target attacking creature an opponent controls loses spaceflight until end of turn.

card.name: Jedi Battle Healer
card.text: Lifelink When Jedi Battle Healer enters, you gain 3 life. Meditate 1W (1W: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Jedi Instructor
card.text: When Jedi Instructor enters, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature. Meditate 1W (1W: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Jedi Starfighter
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Whenever a Jedi creature that crewed Jedi Starfighter this turn meditates, untap Jedi Starfighter. Meditate 1W (1W: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.) Crew 1

card.name: LAAT Gunship
card.text: Whenever LAAT Gunship attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, LAAT Gunship gains spaceflight until end of turn. Otherwise, create a 1/1 white Trooper creature token that’s tapped and attacking. (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Crew 1

card.name: Lando Calrissian
card.text: First strike At the beginning of combat on your turn, target Vehicle creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Loyal Tauntaun
card.text: 1G, Sacrifice Loyal Tauntaun: Regenerate target creature.

card.name: Maintenance Hangar
card.text: If one or more repair counters would be removed from an exiled card you own, remove that many plus one instead. Vehicles you control have repair 6 and exiled Vehicle cards you own have repair.

card.name: Miraculous Recovery
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Nebulon-B Frigate
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) When Nebulon-B Frigate enters, creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn. Crew 1

card.name: Orbital Bombardment
card.text: Destroy all creatures and Vehicles without spaceflight.

card.name: Plo Koon
card.text: You may activate meditate abilities any time you could cast an instant. Meditate 1W (1W: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Riding Ronto
card.text: 3WW: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) As long as Riding Ronto is monstrous, it has vigilance.

card.name: Sand Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control have vigilance.

card.name: Security Droid
card.text: When Security Droid enters, create a 1/1 colorless Droid artifact creature token. Repair 3 (When this is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Snow Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control have first strike.

card.name: Womp Rat
card.text: 4W: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put one +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Womp Rat becomes monstrous, you may exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: X-Wing
card.text: Vigilance Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or greater: This Rebel Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Admiral Ackbar
card.text: When you cast Admiral Ackbar, create two B-Wings, they’re kindred 2/3 blue Rebel Vehicle artifact tokens with spaceflight. At the beginning of each upkeep, untap all Vehicles you control. Whenever two or more Vehicles you control attack, draw a card.

card.name: Armed Protocol Droid
card.text: When Armed Protocol Droid enters, target nonartifact creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn. Repair 3 (When this is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: The Battle of Naboo
card.text: Return X target creatures to their owners’ hands. Draw twice that many cards.

card.name: Cloaking Device
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can’t be blocked. Whenever enchanted creature attacks, defending player loses 1 life.

card.name: Force Denial
card.text: Hate — Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. If an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, counter that spell instead. Scry 1.

card.name: Force Push
card.text: Put target artifact or creature on top of its owner’s library. Scry 1.

card.name: Gungan Captain
card.text: Whenever Gungan Captain deals damage to a creature, tap that creature. That creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

card.name: Jar Jar Binks
card.text: Jar Jar Binks can’t block. When Jar Jar Binks enters, target opponent gains control of it. At the beginning of combat on your turn, tap the creature you control with the highest power. If two or more creatures are tied for the greatest power, you choose one of them.

card.name: Jedi Battle Mage
card.text: When Jedi Battle Mage enters, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step. Meditate 1U (1U: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Jedi Mind Trick
card.text: You control target player during that player’s next turn.

card.name: Jedi Training
card.text: Meditate abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate. Whenever a Jedi creature you control meditates, scry 1.

card.name: Jump Trooper
card.text: Whenever a Trooper creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}.

card.name: Mace Windu
card.text: Flash When Mace Windu enters, return target spell or creature you don’t control to its owner’s hand. Meditate 1U (1U: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Mon Calamari Cruiser
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Whenever Mon Calamari Cruiser deals combat damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent protects, you may draw a card. (Players protect permanents that can be attacked.) Crew 2

card.name: Mon Calamari Initiate
card.text: When Mon Calamari Initiate enters, draw a card. Meditate 1U (1U: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ortolan Keyboardist
card.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Personal Energy Shield
card.text: Counter target spell that targets you or a permanent you control.

card.name: Preordain
card.text: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Probe Droid
card.text: When Probe Droid enters, target player reveals their hand. Repair 3 (When this is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Republic Frigate
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Crew 1

card.name: Rumination
card.text: Draw three cards, then put a card from your hand on top of your library.

card.name: Sabacc Game
card.text: Choose target permanent an opponent controls. That opponent chooses a permanent you control. Flip a coin. If you win the flip, gain control of the permanent you chose. If you lose the flip, your opponent gains control of the permanent they chose.

card.name: Shadow Trooper
card.text: Flash You may cast Trooper creature cards as though they had flash.

card.name: Sith Manipulator
card.text: Hate — When Sith Manipulator enters, return target creature to its owner’s hand. If an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, put that card on top of its owner’s library instead.

card.name: Sith Sorcerer
card.text: When Sith Sorcerer enters, scry 2. Hate — When Sith Sorcerer dies, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Super Battle Droid
card.text: Repair 2 (When this is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile it with two time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Surprise Maneuver
card.text: Untap up to two target creatures you control. Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Ugnaught Scrap Worker
card.text: Droid spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Vapor Snag
card.text: Return target creature to its owner’s hand. Its controller loses 1 life.

card.name: Y-Wing
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Y-Wing can’t block. Whenever Y-Wing deals combat damage to an opponent or a permanent they protect, tap target creature defending player controls. It doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step. (Players protect permanents that can be attacked.) Crew 1

card.name: Zam Wesell
card.text: When you cast Zam Wesell, target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a creature card from it and have Zam Wesell enter as a copy of that creature card.

card.name: Acquire Target
card.text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life. Put a bounty counter on up to one target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Aqualish Bounty Hunter
card.text: Bounty — Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a bounty counter dies, target player discards a card.

card.name: The Battle of Yavin
card.text: For each nonland permanent target opponent controls, that player sacrifices it unless he or she pays X life.

card.name: Bib Fortuna
card.text: When Bib Fortuna enters, search your library for a card, then shuffle, then put that card on top of it. You lose 1 life. When Bib Fortuna dies, shuffle your library.

card.name: Black Market Dealer
card.text: Whenever a Mercenary or Rogue creature you control dies, put a bounty counter on target creature an opponent controls. Bounty — Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a bounty counter dies, target player loses 1 life and draws a card.

card.name: Bounty Spotter
card.text: Bounty Spotter doesn’t untap during your untap step. {T}: Put a bounty counter on target creature an opponent controls. Bounty — Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a bounty counter dies, untap Bounty Spotter.

card.name: Death Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control have deathtouch.

card.name: Doom Blade
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Droid Commando
card.text: When Droid Commando dies, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Repair 3 (When this is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Force Drain
card.text: Force Drain deals 2 damage to any target. If a player was dealt damage this way, you gain 2 life. Scry 1.

card.name: Grand Moff Tarkin
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent’s upkeep, destroy target creature that player controls unless that player pays 2 life. If a player pays life this way, draw a card.

card.name: Hazard Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control have intimidate.

card.name: Head Hunting
card.text: Put a bounty counter on target creature an opponent controls. Each opponent loses 1 life. Draw a card.

card.name: Heavy Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control get +0/+1.

card.name: IG-88B
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever IG-88B deals combat damage to an opponent or a permanent they protect, that player loses life equal to the number of bounty counters among creatures they control. (Players protect permanents that can be attacked.) Repair 3 (When this is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Insatiable Rakghoul
card.text: Insatiable Rakghoul enters with a +1/+1 counter if a nonartifact creature died this turn.

card.name: Interrogation
card.text: Target player discards a card. Then that player discards another card unless they pay 3 life.

card.name: Neophyte Hateflayer
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Open Season
card.text: When Open Season enters, put a bounty counter on any number of target creatures with different controllers. Activated abilities of creatures your opponents control with a bounty counter can’t be activated. Bounty — Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a bounty counter dies, that creature’s controller loses 2 life. Each other player gains 2 life.

card.name: Order 66
card.text: Put a bounty counter on each creature you don’t control, then destroy all creatures you don’t control.

card.name: Repurpose
card.text: Destroy target creature. Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Rule of Two
card.text: As long as you control exactly two creatures, those creatures get +2/+0 and have deathtouch and lifelink.

card.name: Sith Assassin
card.text: Hate — When Sith Assassin enters, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, destroy up to one target nonblack creature.

card.name: Sith Evoker
card.text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature’s power or toughness.

card.name: Sith Inquisitor
card.text: Hate — When Sith Inquisitor enters, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, each opponent discards a card at random.

card.name: Sith Lord
card.text: Menace Sith Lord enters with X +1/+1 counters, where X is the total amount of life lost by your opponents this turn.

card.name: Sith Thoughtseeker
card.text: Hate — 2U: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn.

card.name: Swarm the Skies
card.text: Create two TIE Fighters, they’re 2/1 black Vehicle artifact tokens with spaceflight and crew 1.

card.name: TIE Bomber
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) {1}: TIE Bomber loses spaceflight until end of turn. Activate this ability only during combat. Crew 1

card.name: TIE Interceptor
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Whenever TIE Interceptor attacks, each opponent loses 2 life. Crew 1

card.name: Unruly Sureshot
card.text: When Unruly Sureshot enters, put a bounty counter on target creature an opponent controls. 3R: Unruly Sureshot deals 2 damage to target creature with a bounty counter.

card.name: A-Wing
card.text: Haste Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) {1}: Remove A-Wing from combat. It must attack on your next combat if able. Crew 1

card.name: The Battle of Geonosis
card.text: The The Battle of Geonosis deals X plus 1 damage to each opponent and each creature your opponents control. Creatures you control get +X/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Bounty Sniper
card.text: {T}: Bounty Sniper deals 1 damage to target creature. Bounty — Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a bounty counter dies, untap Bounty Sniper.

card.name: Capture
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. If it has a bounty counter, add RRR.

card.name: Crossfire
card.text: Crossfire deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature’s controller.

card.name: Dark Apprenticeship
card.text: Hate — At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, Dark Apprenticeship deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Flames of Remembrance
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile a card from your graveyard. If you do, put a lore counter on Flames of Remembrance. Sacrifice Flames of Remembrance: Exile the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of lore counters on Flames of Remembrance. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way.

card.name: Force Lightning
card.text: Force Lightning deals X damage to any target. Scry 1 up to X times.

card.name: Force Scream
card.text: Force Scream deals 2 damage to each creature without spaceflight and each player. Scry 1.

card.name: Force Spark
card.text: Force Spark deals 1 damage to any target. Scry 1.

card.name: Gamorrean Prison Guard
card.text: Whenever a creature enters under an opponent’s control, if Gamorrean Prison Guard is untapped, it fights that creature.

card.name: Gundark
card.text: Haste 3RR: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Gundark becomes monstrous, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Han Solo
card.text: First strike At the beginning of combat on your turn, target Vehicle creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Imperial Gunner
card.text: {1}, {T}: Imperial Gunner deals 1 damage to target player, planeswalker, or Vehicle creature.

card.name: Impulsive Wager
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Impulsive Wager, discard a card at random. If the discarded card was a nonland card, draw two cards. Otherwise, put a bounty counter on up to one target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Jango Fett
card.text: Menace, haste Whenever Jango Fett attacks, put a bounty counter on up to one target creature an opponent controls. Whenever Jango Fett attacks, it gets +X/+0, where X is the number of creatures defending player controls with a bounty counter.

card.name: Jar'Kai Battle Stance
card.text: Target creature gains double strike until end of turn. If that creature is a Jedi or Sith, it also gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Lightning Bolt
card.text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Novice Bounty Hunter
card.text: Bounty — Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a bounty counter dies, Novice Bounty Hunter deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Raging Reek
card.text: Raging Reek attacks each turn if able. 5R: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

card.name: Rallying Fire
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Revenge
card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature an opponent controls. The creature you control gets +4/+0 until end of turn before it fights if you lost life this turn.

card.name: Rocket Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control have “When this creature enters, it deals 1 damage to up to one target creature an opponent controls.”

card.name: Shock Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control get +2/+0.

card.name: Sith Marauder
card.text: Hate — When Sith Marauder enters, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, Sith Marauder deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Sith Ravager
card.text: Hate — Whenever an opponent loses life from a source other than combat damage, Sith Ravager gets +1/+0 and gains haste and trample until end of turn.

card.name: Smash to Smithereens
card.text: Destroy target artifact. Smash to Smithereens deals 3 damage to that artifact’s controller.

card.name: Speeder Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Syndicate Enforcer
card.text: When Syndicate Enforcer enters, put a bounty counter on up to one target creature an opponent controls. Whenever a bounty counter is placed on a creature an opponent controls, that creature can’t block this turn.

card.name: Terentatek Cub
card.text: As long as an opponent controls a Jedi or Sith, Terentatek Cub gets +1/+1 and attacks each turn if able.

card.name: V-Wing
card.text: Haste Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Weequay Beastmaster
card.text: Monstrosity abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate. Whenever a creature you control becomes monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: AT-ST
card.text: Other Trooper creatures you control get +3/+3. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Trooper Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Bathe in Bacta
card.text: You gain 6 life. If you lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, you gain 9 life instead.

card.name: The Battle of Endor
card.text: Create X 1/1 green Ewok creature tokens. Put X +1/+1 counters on each creature you control. Creatures you control gain trample and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Bossk
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever a land enters under your control, if you control five or more lands, put a bounty counter on up to one target creature an opponent controls. Bounty — Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a bounty counter dies, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Bounty Collector
card.text: {T}: Untap target land. Bounty — Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a bounty counter dies, untap Bounty Collector

card.name: Corellian Corvette
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) You may have Corellian Corvette assign its combat damage as though it weren’t blocked. Crew 1

card.text: Trample 1R: Ewok Firedancers gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Exogorth

card.name: Force Pull
card.text: Destroy target artifact or creature with flying. Scry 3.

card.name: Hungry Dragonsnake
card.text: Trample Whenever a creature enters under an opponent’s control, put a +1/+1 counter on Hungry Dragonsnake.

card.name: Hutt Crime Lord
card.text: Hutt Crime Lord enters with a bounty counter. Whenever Hutt Crime Lord attacks, it doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

card.name: Ithorian Initiate
card.text: When Ithorian Initiate enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Meditate 1G (1G: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Jedi Battle Sage
card.text: Flash When Jedi Battle Sage enters, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Meditate 1G (1G: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ki-Adi-Mundi
card.text: When Ki-Adi-Mundi enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control. Meditate 1G (1G: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Legacy of the Beloved
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Legacy of the Beloved, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for up to two creature cards that each have a lower mana value than the creature sacrificed to cast Legacy of the Beloved. Put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Mantellian Savrip
card.text: 5GG: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) Creatures with power less than Mantellian Savrip’s power can’t block it.

card.name: Massiff Swarm
card.text: 6G: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

card.name: Millennium Falcon

card.text: The owner of target artifact or enchantment shuffles it into their library.

card.name: Shaak Herd
card.text: When Shaak Herd dies, you may return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Show of Dominance
card.text: Put four +1/+1 counters on the creature with the highest power. If two or more creatures are tied for the greatest power, you choose one of them. That creature gains trample until end of turn.

card.text: Trooper creatures you control have trample.

card.name: Twi'lek Seductress
card.text: Twi’lek Seductress must be blocked if able. Whenever Twi’lek Seductress becomes blocked by a creature, put a bounty counter on that creature.

card.name: Wookiee Bounty Hunter
card.text: Bounty — Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a bounty counter dies, you gain 3 life.

card.name: AAT-1
card.text: Whenever a repair counter is removed from a creature card in your graveyard, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Repair 4 (When this is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile it with four time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.) Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or greater: This Droid Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Acklay of the Arena
card.text: 2RGW: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) Whenever a creature you control becomes monstrous, it fights target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Adroit Hateflayer
card.text: Menace (This creature can’t be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Whenever Adroit Hateflayer attacks, each player loses 2 life.

card.name: Anakin Skywalker
card.text: Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Anakin Skywalker. Sacrifice another creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery. When Anakin Skywalker dies, exile him from your graveyard. If you do, return him to the battlefield transformed. --- (Back): Darth Vader

card.name: Darth Vader
card.text: Menace, Lifelink Whenever Darth Vader attacks, creatures defending player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn for each +1/+1 counter on Darth Vader. --- (Front): Anakin Skywalker

card.name: Asajj Ventress
card.text: Double strike When a creature blocks Asajj Ventress, she gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Hate — Whenever Asajj Ventress attacks, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, up to one target creature blocks this turn if able.

card.name: Aurra Sing, Bane of Jedi
card.text: [+1]: You may have Aurra Sing deal 2 damage to target creature. If you don’t, Aurra Sing deals 1 damage to you. [-4]: Target opponent gets an emblem with “Whenever a nontoken creature you control leaves the battlefield, discard a card.” [-6]: Each player discards their hand. Exile all creatures. Each player’s life total becomes 1.

card.name: Blind Worship
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has “Whenever this creature attacks, each other creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is this creature’s power.”

card.name: Boba Fett
card.text: Menace, deathtouch, haste When Boba Fett enters, put a bounty counter on up to one target creature an opponent controls. Bounty — Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a bounty counter dies, you may draw two cards. If you do, discard two cards.

card.name: Bull Rancor
card.text: Trample 3RGGW: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) As long as Bull Rancor is monstrous, creatures you control have menace.

card.name: C-3PO and R2D2
card.text: When C-3PO and R2D2 leaves the battlefield, you gain 4 life and draw a card. Repair 2 (When this is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may exile it with two time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Carbonite Chamber
card.text: Enchant creature When Carbonite Chamber enters, you may remove a bounty counter from up to one target creature. You control enchanted creature. It can’t attack or block, and its activated abilities can’t be activated.

card.name: Chewbacca
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Chewbacca attacks or blocks, another target creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Chief Chirpa
card.text: 2RGW: Monstrosity 2. Whenever a green creature you control dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on another target Ewok creature you control. When Chief Chirpa becomes monstrous, create three 1/1 green Ewok creature tokens.

card.name: Commander Cody
card.text: Nontoken Trooper creatures you control have “At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 white Trooper creature token.”

card.name: Cruelty of the Sith
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target noncreature spell. • Target player sacrifices a creature. • Cruelty of the Sith deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that permanents controller discards a card.

card.name: Cunning Abduction
card.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. Exile a nonland card revealed this way. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

card.name: Dagobah Maw Slug
card.text: 3RGW: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) As long as Dagobah Maw Slug is monstrous, it has swampwalk.

card.name: Dark Decision
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Dark Decision, pay 1 life. Search the top ten cards of your library for a nonland card, exile it, then shuffle. Until end of turn, you may cast that card.

card.name: Darth Maul
card.text: Double strike, haste Hate — Whenever Darth Maul attacks, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, up to one target creature can’t block Darth Maul this turn.

card.name: Darth Sidious, Sith Lord
card.text: [+3]: Destroy target noncreature permanent. [-2]: Gain control of target creature. [-9]: Darth Sidious deals 7 damage to target player. That player discards seven cards, then sacrifices seven permanents.

card.name: Darth Tyranus, Count Dooku
card.text: [+1]: Up to one target creature gets -6/-0 until your next turn. [-3]: You may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, search your library for an artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. [-6]: Target player’s life total becomes 5. Another target player’s life total becomes 30.

card.name: Echo Base Commando
card.text: Protection from Beasts (This creature can’t be blocked, targeted or dealt damage by Beasts.) Activated abilities of creatures your opponents control cost {2} more to activate.

card.name: Ferocity of the Underworld
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less. • Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. • Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Force Choke
card.text: Counter target spell. When a spell is countered this way, its owner may pay life equal to that spell’s mana value. If they do, they return that card from their graveyard to their hand. Scry 2.

card.name: Force Mastery
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You gain life equal to its mana value.

card.name: General Grievous
card.text: Double strike Whenever another creature dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on General Grievous. Remove two +1/+1 counters from General Grievous: Return General Grievous to its owner’s hand.

card.name: Greater Krayt Dragon
card.text: Trample XXRGW: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Greater Krayt Dragon becomes monstrous, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter among creatures you control.

card.name: Greedo
card.text: Creatures blocking or blocked by Greedo have first strike. When Greedo dies, you may search your library for a Rogue or Mercenary card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

card.name: Hot Pursuit
card.text: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 for each bounty counter on them. Bounty — Whenever a creature an opponent controls with a bounty counter dies, you may put a bounty counter on target creature with the same controller.

card.name: Hunt to Extinction
card.text: Put a bounty counter on up to two target creatures an opponent controls. Hunt to Extinction deals X damage to each creature and an additional X damage to each creature with a bounty counter.

card.name: Images of the Past
card.text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, then exile those creatures.

card.name: Iron Fist of the Empire
card.text: Hate — At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, you gain 2 life and create a Royal Guard, a 2/2 red Soldier creature token with first strike.

card.name: Jabba the Hutt
card.text: Defender {T}: Put a bounty counter on target creature. {R}, {T}: Create a tapped 4/4 red Mercenary creature token. It fights target creature an opponent controls with a bounty counter. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Jedi Knight
card.text: When Jedi Knight leaves the battlefield, return target nonland permanent you don’t control to its owner’s hand. Meditate 1U (1U: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Jedi Sentinel

card.name: Luke Skywalker

card.name: Maintenance Droid
card.text: {T}: Choose target card you own with a repair counter on it. You may remove a repair counter from it or put another repair counter on it. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: March of the Droids
card.text: Remove all repair counters from all cards in your graveyard. Return each card with a repair counter removed this way from your graveyard to the battlefield. Create a 1/1 colorless Droid artifact creature token for each Droid you control.

card.name: Might of the Wild
card.text: Choose one — • Creatures with power 3 or less can’t block this turn. • Destroy target artifact or enchantment. • Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.text: [+1]: Until your next turn, up to one target creature you control gains vigilance and protection from the color of your choice. [-1]: Tap up to three target creatures. [-7]: You get an emblem with “Creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance, first strike, and lifelink.”

card.name: Primal Instinct
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on that creature.

card.name: Princess Leia

card.name: Qui-Gon Jinn
